content: Continue forward, going across the bridge where another Revenant Archer waits for you on the other side. You'll also see a Lavabat hanging from a tree, and three Revenant Charbones kneeling around it. Clear this area, and harvest the **Purple Lingzhi** from underneath the tree. Then, go up the path behind it to the right.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Woods_of_Ember_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Woods of Ember Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Camp of Seasons' and the sub-subsection 'Tip!'.
The content is as follows:
Continue forward, going across the bridge where another Revenant Archer waits for you on the other side. You'll also see a Lavabat hanging from a tree, and three Revenant Charbones kneeling around it. Clear this area, and harvest the **Purple Lingzhi** from underneath the tree. Then, go up the path behind it to the right.
